original_text: We know that this man brings trouble everywhere. Anywhere in the world that Jewish people live, he makes them angry. Then they all fight each other. He is the leader of a group called the Nazarenes.’
korean_text: 우리가 보니 이 사람은 전염병 같은 자라 천하에 흩어진 유대인을 다 소요하게 하는 자요 나사렛 이단의 우두머리라

sentences.original_text: We know that this man brings trouble everywhere.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 이 사람이 어디서나 문제를 일으킨다는 것을 압니다.

sentences.original_text: Anywhere in the world that Jewish people live,
Then they all fight each other.
He is the leader of a group called the Nazarenes.'
